content:
XmlCaseOrder Enum

Definition

Specifies the sort order for uppercase and lowercase letters.

In this Article

public enum XmlCaseOrder
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
XmlCaseOrder

Fields

LowerFirst

Lowercase letters are sorted before uppercase letters.
None

Ignore the case.
UpperFirst

Uppercase letters are sorted before lowercase letters.
